title: Strengthening instructional practice competencies: Mobile media utilization education course for Arabic language learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can use mobile media to communicate basic Arabic conversations and specialized terminology with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners analyze Arabic grammatical structures and enhance sentence-generation skills through mobile learning tools.
Learners apply Arabic communication strategies that consider cultural context to real-world situations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
